<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-b1eb4df elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section" data-id="b1eb4df" data-element_type="section">
<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1b4d1d97 elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column" data-id="1b4d1d97" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5ae098b elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="5ae098b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">What is <span style="color: #ec1c24;">Fire Damage Restoration</span></h2> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-23803c7c elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="23803c7c" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>Fire and smoke damage is highly destructive to property and structures if not properly cleaned in a timely manner. Smoke and soot residue can settle on surfaces throughout the property and will begin to permanently stain within hours. Water from firefighting efforts can also cause significant damage to both the structure of your home and your personal possessions.</p><p>Our smoke and fire damage restoration begins with an initial assessment and free estimate. We then board-up windows and doors and tarp roofs and other areas to secure your property and prevent further damage. If necessary, we can extract water and dry out areas damaged by firefighting efforts. Then we deodorize and restore your home or business to its original condition.</p><h3>Tarp and Board-Up</h3><p>After providing an initial assessment and free estimate, we seal and secure your property. This includes boarding up windows and doors for safety. We also tarp damaged roofs or other parts of the building to prevent further damage from the elements.</p><h3>Water Extraction &amp; Dry Out</h3><p>If necessary, we will remove water associated with extinguishing the fire. After pumping or vacuuming out the water, we use professional grade air movers and dehumidifiers to dry out areas and materials that can be salvaged. We closely monitor our equipment to ensure the fastest drying time possible and prevent further damage. Dry out may take several days depending on the extent of the water damage.</p><h3>Smoke and Soot Removal</h3><p>Our fire damage restoration professionals remove smoke and soot damage using air scrubbers, thermal fogging, and ozone treatments to restore walls, ceilings, cabinets, and furniture. We clean and purify HVAC systems to prevent the spread of soot. Depending on the extent of the damage, offsite restoration services may be required.</p><h3>Deodorize and Sanitize</h3><p>We also deodorize affected furniture, fabric, and other materials that were exposed to smoke and soot. If there was water damage due to firefighting efforts, we sanitize the area to prevent mold growth.</p><h3>Reconstruction</h3><p>The final step to smoke and fire damage restoration is rebuilding and restoring the area to the original condition. This may include painting walls and ceilings, hanging new drywall, laying new carpeting, refinishing or replacing cabinets, and refinishing hardwood floors. It may be necessary to fix structural issues with your property as well.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-df7553f elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section" data-id="df7553f" data-element_type="section">

<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2dfffe2 elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column" data-id="2dfffe2" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">

<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-42e66f6 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="42e66f6" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Why Choose a Professional Fire and <span style="color: #ec1c24;">Smoke Damage Restoration Company?</span></h2> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-1d9e7ae elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="1d9e7ae" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">Smoke and soot travel further than flames, so cleanup can be a challenge. A fire cleanup company is trained to identify and remove smoke and soot damage from your home or business.
After an assessment, they have the right equipment to professionally restore your property. Plus, the fire damage clean up companies in our network offer reconstruction services as well.
Find a <a href="/places/fire-damage-1/">local fire damage restoration company</a> in your area now. If you need immediate assistance, call <a href="tel:1-877-941-2788">1-877-941-2788</a>&nbsp;now to be connected to our on-call smoke and fire damage clean up company for a free, no-obligation estimate.</div>
</div>
</div>
<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-d913dd0 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section" data-id="d913dd0" data-element_type="section">

<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><h3>Local Professionals</h3>
Our crews are local, trained professionals with years of experience in fire damage restoration and smoke cleanup.
<h3>Always Free Estimates</h3>
Let our experienced professionals assess your fire and smoke damage and provide a free, no-obligation estimate on restoring your home or business to its original condition.
<h3>24-Hour Emergency Service</h3>
Smoke and fire damage can happen at any time, so we offer 24-hour emergency services for all types of fire damage clean up and smoke removal.
<h3>30-Minute Response Time</h3>
Smoke and soot are acidic and can begin to do permanent damage within hours. We offer 30-minute rapid response to limit the damage and reduce the cost of repairs.</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><h3>Licensed and Insured</h3><p>Our professionals are licensed and insured to ensure you are protected throughout the restoration process.</p><h3>Professional Equipment and Techniques</h3><p>Our restoration crews use professional-grade equipment and advanced techniques to restore your home or business.</p><h3>We Work With Your Insurance Company</h3><p>Navigating what is covered by insurance can be difficult. We can work with your insurance company to get as much covered as possible.</p></div>

<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>Small kitchen fires, electric fires, smoking, and candles are some&nbsp;<a href="https://www.restorationlocal.com/common-fire-hazards/">common causes of smoke and soot damage</a>. <section class="elementor-element elementor-element-1d00005 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section" data-id="1d00005" data-element_type="section">
<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a4aad0b elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column" data-id="a4aad0b" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-697ecba elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="697ecba" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">The Dangers of <span style="color: #ec1c24;">Smoke and Soot Damage</span></h2> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-9416b2b elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="9416b2b" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>The most common sources of smoke and soot damage are small kitchen fires and incidents with unexpected or uncontrollable fires in fireplaces. While these small fires may not leave significant fire damage or <a href="/water-damage/">water damage</a>, they do pose a risk to the contents of your home or office because of the soot produced during the fire.</p><p>Powdery soot particles are very fine, allowing them to spread throughout the area and cling to almost any surface, including walls, ceilings, and your possessions. Due to the acidic nature of soot, it can quickly stain porous materials like flooring, walls, ceilings, and furniture. It can also damage paintings, photographs, antiques, and even electronics. Our trained professionals are prepared to access the situation quickly in order to limit the chance of lasting damage to your home or business.</p><p>Our smoke damage and soot damage restoration professionals are trained in the proper cleaning procedures to product your belongings and restore your home or business. The restoration process typically begins with ventilating and filtering the air to prevent additional exposure to smoke and soot residue. The entire area is then cleaned from the top down to remove the soot. Fabric and other fibrous materials may be vacuumed or laundered.</p><p>Depending on the severity of the damage, wooden cabinets and furniture may require refinishing. Walls and ceilings will likely need to be repainted after they are thoroughly cleaned. Exposed metals will likely need to be cleaned or even replaced in some rare cases. While our trained specialists do their best to restore everything, there are times when items need to be discarded.</p></div>
</div>
</div>

<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-a09fcc8 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section" data-id="a09fcc8" data-element_type="section">
<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-d1f171b elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column" data-id="d1f171b" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-5b9b985 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="5b9b985" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">The Effects of <span style="color: #ec1c24;">Smoke and Fire Damage</span></h2> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e3a4c5a elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="e3a4c5a" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix">Depending on the severity of the fire, fire and smoke damage can cause both cosmetic and structural damage. Additionally, it can damage personal items.</div>
</div>
</div>
<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-207d57c7 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section" data-id="207d57c7" data-element_type="section">
<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-no">
<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-37cc1c36 elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-inner-column" data-id="37cc1c36" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-c7ecab0 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="c7ecab0" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><h3>Cosmetic Damage</h3><p>Smoke and soot can stain and discolor ceilings, walls, carpeting, floors, furniture, and fabrics with just a few hours of exposure. Over time soot can corrode metals. Wooden items, including furniture, cabinets, and flooring may require refinishing.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-391baefc elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-inner-column" data-id="391baefc" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-90fe5b9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="90fe5b9" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><h3>Structural Damage</h3><p>Severe fires may cause significant structural damage to roofing as well as interior and exterior walls. Water due to firefighting efforts can also severely weaken or cause permanent structural damage to your property.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-11c899c6 elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-inner-column" data-id="11c899c6" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-47f5bbc elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="47f5bbc" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><h3>Damage to Personal Items</h3><p>Fire, smoke, soot, and water can also damage or even destroy personal possessions like televisions, personal electronics, books, photographs, musical instruments, and many other items.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-fe04a7f elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section" data-id="fe04a7f" data-element_type="section">
<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-a19dfdc elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column" data-id="a19dfdc" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-3b718cc elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="3b718cc" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default"><a href="/fire-damage/cost/">How Much Does <span style="color: #ec1c24;"> Fire and Smoke Damage Restoration Cost?</span></a></h2> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-17d1b51 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="17d1b51" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>It’s difficult to predict the cost of smoke and fire damage restoration without seeing the extent of the damage first hand. Common factors that impact restoration costs are the:</p><ul><li>Extent of structural damage caused by fire and flames</li><li>Amount of cosmetic damage caused by smoke and soot</li><li>Size of the area affected</li><li>Types of materials involved</li><li>Difficulty of extracting the water, if there is water damage</li><li>Amount of reconstruction necessary</li></ul><p>Your insurance policy may cover some or all of the cost for fire damage restoration and smoke cleanup. Call <a href="tel:1-877-941-2788">1-877-941-2788</a>&nbsp;now for a free, no-obligation estimate on fire, smoke, and soot damage restoration.</p><p><a href="/fire-damage/cost/">Learn about the Cost of Fire Damage Restoration</a></p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-9eb3543 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section" data-id="9eb3543" data-element_type="section">
<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-e30229d elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column" data-id="e30229d" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-b0b48d9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="b0b48d9" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Rooms Most Likely to be Affected by <span style="color: #ec1c24;">Fire and Smoke Damage</span></h2> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f5a8d54 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="f5a8d54" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>While fire, smoke and soot damage can affect any room, certain factors make specific rooms more prone to fire and smoke damage.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-bdb72ff elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section" data-id="bdb72ff" data-element_type="section">
<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-no">
<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f628917 elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-inner-column" data-id="f628917" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-36cb0cf elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="36cb0cf" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><h3>Kitchens</h3><p>Kitchen fires account for nearly half of all fires in homes. From food left unattended on the stovetop to baked-on grease in the oven, there are numerous potential fire hazards in the kitchen.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-91553aa elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-inner-column" data-id="91553aa" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-ee87be9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="ee87be9" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><h3>Bedrooms</h3><p>After kitchens, bedrooms are one of the highest risk rooms for fire and smoke damage. While mattresses made after 2007 are flame-retardant, older mattresses, bedding, curtains, and clothing are flammable under the right conditions. Candles and malfunctioning space heaters and electric blankets are the most common sources of ignition.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
 <div class="elementor-element elementor-element-2fdf28a elementor-column elementor-col-33 elementor-inner-column" data-id="2fdf28a" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-849dbe8 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="849dbe8" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><h3>Bathrooms</h3><p>Bathrooms are prone to fire and smoke damage due to the volume of paper goods and towels. Candles and malfunctioning personal electrical devices like hairdryers and curling irons are the most common sources of ignition.</p></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
<section class="elementor-element elementor-element-6a29385 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section" data-id="6a29385" data-element_type="section">
<div class="elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default">
<div class="elementor-row">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-f9b12c0 elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column" data-id="f9b12c0" data-element_type="column">
<div class="elementor-column-wrap  elementor-element-populated">
<div class="elementor-widget-wrap">
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-6dc3fdf elementor-widget elementor-widget-heading" data-id="6dc3fdf" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="heading.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<h2 class="elementor-heading-title elementor-size-default">Call Now For Smoke and <span style="color: #ec1c24;">Fire Damage Restoration Services</span></h2> </div>
</div>
<div class="elementor-element elementor-element-63f3a9e elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="63f3a9e" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
<div class="elementor-widget-container">
<div class="elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix"><p>Whether you have a small kitchen grease fire or a catastrophic structure fire, our local smoke and fire damage restoration professionals are here to help. No matter the cause of your fire or smoke-related emergency, our team will clean it up.</p><p>From residential smoke damage restoration to commercial fire damage mitigation, we are ready to help no matter how large or small the job. We are a full-service fire damage restoration and smoke cleanup service company with years of experience.</p><p>Call <a href="tel:1-877-941-2788">1-877-941-2788</a>&nbsp;now for a free, no-obligation estimate. We always offer 24-hour emergency service and 30-minute response time. Let our compassionate and dependable restoration specialists give you peace of mind in an emergency.</p></div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</section>

<script>
  let slideUp = (target, duration=500) => {
    target.style.transitionProperty = 'height, margin, padding';
    target.style.transitionDuration = duration + 'ms';
    target.style.boxSizing = 'border-box';
    target.style.height = target.offsetHeight + 'px';
    target.offsetHeight;
    target.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    target.style.height = 0;
    target.style.paddingTop = 0;
    target.style.paddingBottom = 0;
    target.style.marginTop = 0;
    target.style.marginBottom = 0;
    window.setTimeout( () => {
      target.style.display = 'none';
      target.style.removeProperty('height');
      target.style.removeProperty('padding-top');
      target.style.removeProperty('padding-bottom');
      target.style.removeProperty('margin-top');
      target.style.removeProperty('margin-bottom');
      target.style.removeProperty('overflow');
      target.style.removeProperty('transition-duration');
      target.style.removeProperty('transition-property');
      //alert("!");
    }, duration);
  }

  let slideDown = (target, duration=500) => {
    target.style.removeProperty('display');
    let display = window.getComputedStyle(target).display;

    if (display === 'none')
      display = 'block';

    target.style.display = display;
    let height = target.offsetHeight;
    target.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    target.style.height = 0;
    target.style.paddingTop = 0;
    target.style.paddingBottom = 0;
    target.style.marginTop = 0;
    target.style.marginBottom = 0;
    target.offsetHeight;
    target.style.boxSizing = 'border-box';
    target.style.transitionProperty = "height, margin, padding";
    target.style.transitionDuration = duration + 'ms';
    target.style.height = height + 'px';
    target.style.removeProperty('padding-top');
    target.style.removeProperty('padding-bottom');
    target.style.removeProperty('margin-top');
    target.style.removeProperty('margin-bottom');
    window.setTimeout( () => {
      target.style.removeProperty('height');
      target.style.removeProperty('overflow');
      target.style.removeProperty('transition-duration');
      target.style.removeProperty('transition-property');
    }, duration);
  }
  var slideToggle = (target, duration = 500) => {
    if (window.getComputedStyle(target).display === 'none') {
      return slideDown(target, duration);
    } else {
      return slideUp(target, duration);
    }
  }
</script>

<script>
  function toggleMenu() {
    // var btn = event.target;
    var html = document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0];
    
    // ast-flyout-below-menu-overlay
    
    if (html.classList.contains('ast-flyout-below-menu-overlay') == false) {
      // SHOW MENU
      // btn.classList.add('toggled');
      html.classList.add('ast-flyout-below-menu-overlay');
      document.getElementsByClassName("ast-below-header-actual-nav")[0].style.display = 'block';
    } else {
      // HIDE MENU
      // btn.classList.remove('toggled');
      html.classList.remove('ast-flyout-below-menu-overlay');
    }
  }
  document.getElementsByClassName('menu-below-header-toggle')[0].addEventListener('click', toggleMenu);
  document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0].classList.add('below-header-toggle-on'); // 
  
  
  var menuCloseBtn = document.createElement("span");
  menuCloseBtn.classList.add('ast-nav-close', 'close');
  menuCloseBtn.addEventListener('click', toggleMenu);
  
  document.querySelectorAll('.ast-below-header-navigation-wrap').forEach(function (wrap) {
    wrap.addEventListener('click', function (event) {
      event.stopPropagation();
      if (event.target.classList.contains('ast-below-header-navigation-wrap')) {
        toggleMenu();
      }
    });
  });
  
  document.getElementsByClassName("ast-below-header-actual-nav")[0].prepend(menuCloseBtn);
  
  // Mobile menu sub-items
  document.querySelectorAll(".ast-menu-toggle").forEach(btn => {
  btn.addEventListener('click', event => {
      var ul = btn.parentNode.querySelector('ul');

      if (!ul) {
	return;
      }

      if (ul.style.display == "block") {
        ul.style.display = "";
      } else {
        ul.style.display = "block";
      }
    });
  });
  
  // Sticky header.
  // Wrapper 1
  var el = document.querySelector('div.main-header-bar-wrap');
  var el2 = document.querySelector('div.ast-below-header-wrap');
  var wrapper = document.createElement('div');
  // wrapper.classList.add('ast-stick-primary-below-wrapper', 'alex-wrapper-1');
  wrapper.classList.add('ast-stick-primary-below-wrapper', 'alex-wrapper-1');
  
  el.parentNode.insertBefore(wrapper, el);
    
  wrapper.appendChild(el);
  wrapper.appendChild(el2);

  // Wrapper 2
  var el = document.querySelector('div.ast-stick-primary-below-wrapper');
  var wrapper = document.createElement('div');
  wrapper.classList.add('alex-wrapper-2');
  wrapper.setAttribute('data-stick-support', 'on');
  wrapper.setAttribute('data-stick-maxwidth', '561');
  wrapper.setAttribute('data-stick-gutter', '0');
  el.parentNode.insertBefore(wrapper, el);
  wrapper.appendChild(el);
  
  window.addEventListener('scroll', function(e) {
    if (window.scrollY > 10) {
      document.querySelectorAll('.ast-stick-primary-below-wrapper, .ast-above-header').forEach(
        el => {
          el.classList.add('ast-sticky-active','ast-sticky-shrunk','ast-header-sticked');
        }
      );
      document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0].classList.add('ast-below-sticky-header-active'); // 
    } else {  
      document.querySelectorAll('.ast-stick-primary-below-wrapper, .ast-above-header').forEach(
        el => {
          el.classList.remove('ast-sticky-active','ast-sticky-shrunk','ast-header-sticked');
        }
      );
      document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0].classList.remove('ast-below-sticky-header-active'); // 
    }
  });

  // SLIDERS
  document.querySelectorAll(".elementor-widget-media-carousel, .elementor-widget-testimonial-carousel").forEach(function (carousel) {
    var carSettings = JSON.parse(carousel.getAttribute('data-settings'));
    var slideWidth = 100 / carSettings.slides_per_view + '%';
    
    carousel.querySelectorAll('.swiper-slide').forEach(function (slide) {
      slide.style.width = slideWidth;
    });
    
    carousel.querySelectorAll('.elementor-swiper-button').forEach(function (btn) {
      // btn.style.display = 'none';
      btn.classList.add('hide-on-desktop');
    });
  });
  
  document.querySelectorAll(".elementor-swiper-button").forEach(function (btn) {
    btn.addEventListener('click', function (event) {
      var btn = event.target.closest('.elementor-swiper-button');
      
      var wrapper = event.target.closest('.swiper-container').querySelector('.swiper-wrapper');
      var totalSlides = wrapper.querySelectorAll('.swiper-slide').length;
      
      var currentSlide = wrapper.getAttribute('current-slide');
      if (!currentSlide) {
        currentSlide = 0;
      }
      
      if (btn.className.includes('next')) {
        currentSlide++;
      } else {
        currentSlide--;
      }
      
      var ds = wrapper.parentNode.querySelector('.swiper-button-disabled');
      if (ds) {
        ds.classList.remove('swiper-button-disabled');
      }
      
      if (currentSlide < 0) {
        currentSlide = 0;
      }
      if (currentSlide >= totalSlides) {
        currentSlide = totalSlides-1;
      }
      
      if (currentSlide == 0 || (currentSlide+1) == totalSlides) {
        btn.classList.add('swiper-button-disabled');
      }
      
      var oneSlideWidth = wrapper.querySelector('.swiper-slide').clientWidth;
      
      var shift = -oneSlideWidth*currentSlide;
      wrapper.style['transform'] = "translate3d(" + shift + "px, 0px, 0px)";
      wrapper.style['transition-duration'] = '300ms';
      
      wrapper.setAttribute('current-slide', currentSlide);
    });
  });
  
  var heroWrapElement = document.querySelector('.elementor-section-wrap');
  var heroElement = document.querySelector('.elementor-section-stretched');
  var bodyElement = document.querySelector('body');
  var astBreakPoint = -1;
  
  // Make hero image full width
  function resizeHero(event) {
    if (document.documentElement.clientWidth > 768) {
      if (astBreakPoint !== 0) {
        bodyElement.classList.remove('ast-header-break-point');
        astBreakPoint = 0;
      }
    } else {
      if (astBreakPoint !== 1) {
        bodyElement.classList.add('ast-header-break-point');
        astBreakPoint = 1;
      }
    }
    
    if (heroElement) {
      var rect = heroWrapElement.getBoundingClientRect();
  
      var w = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientWidth, window.innerWidth || 0);
      heroElement.style.width = w + 'px';
      
      if (rect.left > 5) {
        heroElement.style.left = -rect.left + 'px';
      }
    }
  }
  
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", resizeHero);
  window.addEventListener("resize", resizeHero);
  
  document.querySelectorAll(".elementor-tab-title").forEach(function (btn) {
    btn.addEventListener('click', function (event) {
      event.preventDefault();
      
      var parent = event.currentTarget.closest('.elementor-widget');
      var item = event.currentTarget.closest('.elementor-accordion-item');
      
      document.querySelectorAll(".elementor-accordion-icon-opened").forEach(function (el) {
        el.style.display = 'none';
      });
      document.querySelectorAll(".elementor-accordion-icon-closed").forEach(function (el) {
        el.style.display = 'block';
      });
      
      item.querySelector('.elementor-accordion-icon-opened').style.display = 'block';
      item.querySelector('.elementor-accordion-icon-closed').style.display = 'none';
      
      var contentId = event.currentTarget.getAttribute('aria-controls');
      // console.log(event.currentTarget);
      // console.log(contentId);
      if (!contentId) {
        return;
      }
      document.querySelectorAll(".elementor-tab-content").forEach(function (tab) {
        if (tab.style.display == 'block') {
          slideUp(tab);
        }
        // tab.style.display = 'none';
      });
      
      
      slideDown(parent.querySelector('#' + contentId));
      // parent.querySelector('#' + contentId).style.display = 'block';
      
      // console.log(document.getElementById(contentId));
      
      // console.log(parent);
    });
  });
  
	</script>
